title: require.Sandbox
desc: A flexible sandbox for require.js w/out dependencies

title: This page
desc: A nearly static website powered by a lot of Backbone and Marionette stuff glued together with requirejs. Animated with jQuery and the fullPage.js plugin. Icons are taken from the free icon set Pictonic, font is Roboto Slab.
The design for my Ghost blog based on HTML5 and CSS3. Works without any JavaScript by default. Licensed unser MIT, it is free available.

title: Bogosort
desc: A sort module that allows you to sort collections with the bogosort algorithm. Bogosort is based on randomly shuffling data until it is sorted correctly and is usually not used in production. Also available as npm package.

title: colorzy
desc: colorzy is a small utility that allows you to insert formatting methods into objects, usually used with String. Also available as npm package.

title: smidig
desc: A framework that helps you to write small and flexible APIs that can be used on the server and exposed as a read-only RESTful API to the client using express. Also available as npm package.
